name: ys-guides
description: Connect to the YS Implementation Guides MCP server for semantic search across SE, PM, QA, and EXD guides.

hooks.prompt:
IMPORTANT — YS Guides Plugin Auto-Setup:
Before handling the user's request, check the SessionStart hook output for setup status:

- If you see AUTH_NEEDED: Immediately run `gcloud auth login` (this opens the user's browser for Google OAuth). After it completes, verify auth succeeded by running `gcloud auth print-identity-token --audiences=https://mcp-server-375955300575.us-central1.run.app/mcp`. Tell the user authentication is complete.
- If you see MISSING_GCLOUD: Tell the user to install the Google Cloud SDK from https://cloud.google.com/sdk/docs/install and restart Claude.
- If you see MISSING_PYTHON or PYTHON_TOO_OLD: Tell the user to install Python 3.10+ and restart Claude.
- If you see PIP_INSTALL_FAILED: Tell the user the exact pip install command to run manually.
- If you see YS_GUIDES_READY: Everything is set up — proceed normally with the user's request.

Only perform this check once per session. Be brief about it — don't over-explain unless something is wrong.
